entry.title: Wednesday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 22.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Increasing cloudiness after midnight. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40. Low minus 22. Wind chill minus 28 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Periods of snow. High minus 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of light snow beginning in the morning. Blowing snow over exposed areas in the afternoon. Amount 2 cm. Wind west 20 km/h gusting to 40 increasing to 40 gusting to 60 in the morning. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 33 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM AST Wednesday 01 March 2023
